author: langers
content:
Hey! Thank you for the reply Danny. We have spent a considerable amount of time analysing the options and we concur with your concerns.

We still feel that the 0x02 credential would be beneficial and we would use it, if implemented, but we understand that it would add complexity to consensus without fully solving the problem. We have explored our options and we believe we have a crypto-economic mechanism that gives us the same protection as 0x02 and we are in collaboration with Flashbots to be part of the MEV solution. Many thanks, all the best, and hope to catch up soon.

author: jcrtp
content: We have created a research repository here to capture the problem and our ideas on how to mitigate it: <https://github.com/rocket-pool/rocketpool-research>

author: jcrtp
content: Hopefully it can act as a catalyst to further the conversation, which has been enormously beneficial so far
